message: Module error while trying to scrape and log external temperature: error during external temperature scraping: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='api.open-meteo.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /v1/forecast?latitude=47.4984&longitude=19.0405&current_weather=true (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf57dae10>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 101] Network is unreachable')) (ConnectionError).
